ovdesc.p: The LC.ADVICE.TEXT file holds static narrative information data for use in the mapping of the construction of L/C Advices/Documents generated as a result of L/C transactions, within the T24 Delivery Application.

desc.p: This is the key to the LC.ADVICE.TEXT file.
During the input of an L/C this code can be entered for the inclusion of standard text.
It can accept either of below values
Customer Number - Text,Text can be 1-10 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Customer Number should exists in CUSTOMER table
Applicant customer – Inco Terms – Mode of Shipment
Contains the narrative which is used in the construction of L/C Advices/Documents generated as a result of L/C transactions.
Contains a short meaningful description of the LC.ADVICE.TEXT for enrichment purposes.
Free format input that is descriptive of the full advice narrative.
This field indentifies the short mnemonic of documents to be defaulted in LETTER.OF.CREDIT.
